comments.body: If you want to make one thread for sports tips, you should be diligent in providing updates, especially if you want to make tips about several matches at once. It requires careful news updating, so you must return to your thread frequently.You can try it here and see how people respond. comments.author: Yamifoud
comments.body: We have plenty of sports betting threads in the gambling discussion section that are focused on specific sports. If you want to share or read tips, I suggest visiting those threads. The members in these forums share their tips based on their personal analysis, unlike so-called experts who may not actually help you profit from sports betting. Here, you have the freedom to share your thoughts, and if you're successful, you'll likely earn a lot of followers, as long as you're offering your tips for free.
